**Request for Information for Language Training Services**
==========================================================

**Title:** Request for Information for Language Training Services in the National Capital Region (NCR)
**Reference Number:** WS4266852601-Doc4275755135
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Tender Type:** Selective Tendering
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Background**
------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting interested contractors to submit information on their capacity to deliver language training services in the National Capital Region (NCR). The government seeks to understand the capabilities of potential suppliers to provide comprehensive language training solutions.

**Request for Information**
------------------------

This request for information (RFI) aims to clarify the requirements of the Department and to gather information from potential contractors on their capabilities and experience in delivering language training services. The RFI does not constitute a request for bid, and responses will not be used to select suppliers for a contract.

**Schedule**
------------

* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-31
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-30
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-09-30
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Ongoing (No end date specified)

**Information and Contact**
-------------------------

* **Contact Person:** Tania Boyer, PSPC
* **Email:** tania.boyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17875880?extsite=MTc4NzU4ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Response Requirements**
----------------------

* Respondents must provide information on their experience, qualifications, and capabilities in delivering language training services.
* Respondents must provide a detailed description of the services they can offer, including but not limited to language training courses, instructor qualifications, and evaluation methods.

The government reserves the right to select potential contractors based on the information provided in response to this RFI. All responses will be treated as confidential. By responding to this RFI, contractors agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of the request.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This RFI does not seek information on trade agreements. The government is seeking only to gather information on language training services.
